title: Will Speaks Out on Keeping His Cool Amid the Drama
description:
Will — call sign “Little Willy” — stops by “Bachelor Happy Hour” to catch up with Becca and Tayshia and break down his role in all the drama from this week’s episode of “The Bachelorette” and his journey on the show so far. 

Will discusses it all, including how the tension with Peter began, how excited he was to win extra time with Michelle during the “Top Gun: Maverick” group date, and how he was able to keep his composure during the drama at the after-party.  

Plus, he discusses how shocked he was to discover it was Jamie who ruined last week’s Rose Ceremony and his admiration for how Michelle handled the whole situation.  

Then, Will shares his thoughts on some of the other men while playing Bachelorette Superlatives. Becca and Tayshia also discuss other memorable moments from the episode, including that amazing one-on-one with Rodney, and Michelle’s abrupt dismissal of Jamie at the Rose Ceremony.  

“Bachelor Happy Hour” has exclusive interviews every week. Watch “The Bachelorette” on ABC and listen to “Bachelor Happy Hour” the next morning.  

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.  

Thanks to our sponsors:    

Vizzy: Vizzyhardseltzer.com/Bachelor 

Rothy’s: Rothys.com/BHH
